ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: msk was officially registered in the year 1992. It shapened to emerge as an all women organization, operating in the field of economic and social up liftment of women in Bhopal. MSK is a secular organization recognized by the State government registered in the Firms & Societies Act, having its own four worksheds at Dwarka Nagar near the railway station, at one of the most gas affected areas in Bhopal. Currently, MSK caters to the need of 500 women in these worksheds allotted to this organization by the State government. Block printing, kalamkari tailoring,embroidery and zardosi are the main trades. The central government Human Resource Development HRD has given us the project and all the needful assistance

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Organisation is running higher secondary school since 1979 with more than 500 students. Organisation has organized many awareness camp in respect to Swarn Jayanti yojana including PMRY, IRDP, Indra Awas Yojana, Panchayti raj etc successfully. Organisation also running many program women rights and empowerment, eliminate Gender issue, eliminate child marriage and dowry system. Organization has organized many health awareness and free health check up camp in rural areas like HIV/AIDS awareness campaign also has established a dispensary at Porsa in the year 98-99. Organization is running 5 creche programs for poor working women and children. As in the past years, parishad organised family welfare awareness camps in slums and labour oriented area and provided awareness through resource person, the method of maintenance of gap in the birth of Two childrenâ€™s, use of condoms, etc to the eligible couple. Parishad organised awareness camps to protect natural environment in slum and industrial area. Awareness was created in respect of environment, factors responsible for pollution and measures to be taken up by slum dwellers to control pollution and maintenance of neat and clean environment for their good health. Organisation is running family counselling centres for women who are having family problems. Over all about 1200 cases has been registered till date out of 960 scaled and remaining are under process. Organization ran computer training for youth and women in past years. All the students from program have got employment in public and private sector. In past, organization has organized road safety program in many areas of morena and Gwalior dist. Training in dress designing and swinging to poor unemployed women is a regular feature since 1980. They are given training in dress designing for a period of one year so that they could established income and also organization distributed free swing machine to poor women to start their live hood. Organisation has provided training for making handicraft item to poor family/women/girls to give them opportunity for employment and to preserve natural heritage in area of Morena dist. Organisation has provide training program for Two/Three/Four wheeler repairing to unemployed poor youth of weaker section for a period of 1 year.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: 1.The project of R.C.H. started in the area of villages in Harda and Badwani Districts. Under this project R.C.H. the mother NGO in 50 villages of the above said districts, gave safety injections to pregnant ladies and gave vaccination to childrens to project from many disease. Neat about 200000 poor ladies and childrens benefited through programmes. This project is still continuing from the year 1994. 2.To make self dependent of Indoreâ€™s Poor Old Age people. The mother NGO conducted counseling campus, gave monitory help, nutritious food, long stay and short stay to benefit about 60000 old age peoples. 3.To uplift the financial status of farmers in Dewas District, 500000 Herbal Planted in waste Land of farmers. The NGO worked regularly to uplift the standard of farmers. 4.In the 21 Tribal District Dhar, NGO worked through new technique in agriculture. NGO promoted water management, drought agriculture, plantation and also in related business maters to give the farmers a new hope of ray in life. Programmes successfully conducted from the year 2000 to 2003. 5.The NGO made literate more than 2000 childrens of rural areas in Indore district by educating them without taking any fees. From the year 1986 this programme is still continuing successfully. 6.NGO worked for making self confident of schedule cast and schedule tribes students. Conducted coaching center for P.S.C. and Banking. 35 students benefited through this programmes. 7.Under the Ayush project more than 100000 poor people got free treatment by the NGO. NGO trained 500 doctors and asked to adopt the Ayush Projects programmes, so that most of the poor village people get benefit in taking natural medicines. This programme continuously done from 2004 to 2008. 8.NGO worked for releasing the poor village women of Indore district from dishonor and misbehavior from the society, conducted counseling camp, Law assistants camp etc. Near about 15000 ladies benefited and leading a happy life. As this programme became popular from 1986 still it is continuing successfully. 9.Giving art and tailoring classes to near about 200 poor unemployed ladies, the NGO made them self dependent. Also give training in Handloom making Dari to 90 poor Ladies and Gents made them self dependent. More over NGO established a Handloom factory to the trained Ladies and Gents so that they become self dependent. 10.NGO distributed 25 sewing machines to poor women and also distributed Rs. 3000 to 5000 to old age people to start small shops so they can earn Rs. 30 to 50 per day. NGO distributed Rs. 5000 as Loan to 60 poor Ladies to make them self dependent so that they can lead respected life. This programme conducted from the year 1994 to 2002. 11.To make aware the villages poor women about the points of Law and release from dishonor of the society, NGO conducted awareness camps and made womens committee, conducted 26 Rallies and 33 Dharnas. Through this programme 9227 Ldies got benefits. This programme conducted from 1989 to 2001. 12.For the protection of environment in village Dorjicaradiya and Badna village of Sawer Block in Indore district, NGO distributed 109 power saving Stoves, 7 biogas plants and 100000 plants for environment protection and also made committees for youth and Ladies. To make self dependent distributed Loan to poor ladies and made 51 bathrooms for villages. This programme successfully work from the year 1994 to 1997. 13.For poor Ladies who is going for their daily bread, NGO opened a CRUSH for their childrens , to look after the childrens of ladies going for work. The working ladies leaved their small childrens without any fear. 299 childrens benefited through this programs. This programs run smoothly from 1986 to 1999. 14.National unity campus conducted by NGO in Mansoor and Indore district, attended by the youths of various states. Each campus duration was 8 days and more than 700 youths benefited. These types of camps conducted from 1998 to 2002. 15.NGO worked in Indore district for saving water and use of water harvesting. For the promotion of this programs 500000 pamphlets distributed. 16.NGO established a School for mentally retarded childrens. The poor parents who cannot give attention to their M.R. childrens and they keep such children in the closed dark rooms as they have to go for their daily bread. To keep the main aim to educate such type of childrens, the NGO opened a special school without taking any fees. From the year 2000 still the school is working in Indore district. Through this 140 childrens benefited. 17.The NGO released about 25 mental patients, those who were in mental Hospitals closed rooms from the last so many years. Not only they become free and independent but also rehabilitated them so that they could lead a joint life. 18.To make aware about AIDS in youth, NGO conducted awareness classes in several schools of Indore district and more than 1000 students benefited. Near about 2700 students benefited through conducting yoga classes. This most valuable programs successfully conducted from the year 2000 to 2007. 19.Through networking all the NGO of M.P. to come under one roof to take benefits from the Government, NGO organized 6 conferences and 229 representation of NGOs attended the conferences. From 1999 to 2005 these type of conferences organized to make unity of NGOs. 20.To make more impressive work of social services and cooperation with Institutions and NGOs, our NGO worked very hard. All this work done free of cost and self will.
